name: Nott's Seagull Shooter
description:
Kill the crab and then pick off the seagulls as they swarm to come eat the crab meat. Try to get as many seagulls as you can before they get you back.

Move with WASD or arrow keys and jump with Spacebar. Shoot and aim with your mouse.

I made this little fan game to celebrate my love and appreciation for the DnD show Critical Role! The game is from a funny little scene in Campaign 2: Episode 33.

I hand painted all of the assets in this game myself using watercolour paints. All of the code is mine too. The sound effects are from FreeSound.org. The concept, characters, and idea is from Critical Role.

If you're interested in following more of my work, here's where you can find me:
